A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie is exceptional with some of the best dialogue\, action scenes\, and emotion in the entire series. I get why people left the theatre with mixed emotions\, but to those people I would say embrace what is new. People have been so hung up over fan theories for the past two years that they can’t appreciate what has been done here. This move is amazing\, do not let the reddit trolls let you think otherwise.
